nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model
Class PairSegment

java.lang.Object
  nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Segment
      nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.PairSegment

public class PairSegment
extends Segment

A line segment representing a pair of threads. All segments in one stitch share a single style instance. Different stitches have different style instances. Segments in a single stitch stick together like Siamese twins. Movements are also restricted by pins.

Author:
J. Pol

Parameters:
start - start point of the bezier curve
c1 - optional first control point of the bezier curve
c2 - optional second control point of the bezier curve
end - end point of the bezier curve
twistMarkLength - length of the line segment perpendicular through the pair segment to indicate a twist
